title: Shutter Island RIP - Unleashed
description:
US Marshal Teddy Daniels has come to Shutter Island, home of Ashecliffe Hospital for the Criminally Insane. Along with his partner Chuck he sets out to find an escaped patient, a murderess name Rachel Solando, as a hurricane bears down upon them. But nothing at Ashecliffe Hospital is what it seems, and disappearing patients isnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t the only secret the island hides. The closer they get to the truth though, the more elusive it becomes, and the more they fear that someone doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t want them to leave Shutter Island alive!

Features

Based on the Paramount Pictures film.
Beautiful visuals depict Shutter Island before, during, and after the storm.
Innovative blend of Hidden Object and Adventure play-styles.
Immersive gameplay that pulls you into the secluded, 1950 s mental institution.

System Requirements

Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2 Ghz or greater
Memory: 1280 MB
Hard Drive: 150 MB
Video Card (graphics): DirectX 9.0c Compatible Graphics card with 128 MB VRAM
Sound Card: DirectX compliant Sound card
DirectX: DirectX 9.0c

Install Notes

1. UnRAR
2. Install and enjoy
